summary: Announced successful firing and deep throttling test of India's first electric motor-driven single-piece semi-cryogenic engine, a key milestone for clustered engine flight, developed at their AS9100D certified Rocket Factory - 1.
Announced AS9100D certification and wished Happy New Year, marking the certification as a key milestone.
Announced receiving financial assistance and support from the Technology Development Board (TDB) for the Agnibaan launch vehicle project, capable of delivering payloads up to 300 kg to 700 km orbits.
Posted Diwali greetings to its audience.
Released Episode 4 of their video series 'Agnikul - Launch Anywhere Anytime Affordably', discussing the 'Plug & Play' concept for their launch vehicles.
Launched 'A Cosmos Store' (shop.agnikul.in) for exclusive merchandise, following participation and positive reception at the 8th Bengaluru Space Expo 2024.

Saraniya P (Vehicle Director, Agnibaan SOrTeD) and Umamaheswari K (Project Director, Mission-01) received the Rekha Shetty Memorial Award from RCMTC, recognizing their contributions to the successful Agnibaan SOrTeD flight on May 30, 2024.

Released a launch video of Agnibaan SOrTeD Mission-01 (May 30, 2024) and detailed key mission achievements including India's first semi-cryo engine launch, first private launchpad launch, and world's first single-piece 3D printed engine flight.
